sect2.title: Sorting the items list
sect2.para: Your actions and menus will be displayed in file manager context menus in the same order that they are listed in the Items list, on the left pane of the main &appname; window.

listitem.para: sort your actions and menus in ascending or descending alphabetical order of their label,
or do not sort, and manually organize your actions and menus in your own order.

sect3.title: Alphabetically sorting your actions and menus
sect3.para: In these modes, actions and menus are sorted depending of their label, inside of their parent.

figure.title: Sort buttons in the main window

textobject.phrase: Shows the three sort buttons in the main window.

caption.para: Sort buttons in the main window

sect3.para: You may sort your actions by:

listitem.para:
Click on
(resp. ) button to sort your actions in ascending (resp. descending) order.

sect3.title: Manually organizing your actions and menus
sect3.para: In this mode, a new action or a new menu will be inserted just before the current action or menu, inside of the same parent if apply.
